Supported pixel types usable by textures and renderbuffers.

Imports

gl

Types

Red8 = distinct uint8
8-bit red color values.   Source Edit 
Red16 = distinct uint16
16-bit red color values.   Source Edit 
Red32 = distinct uint32
32-bit red color values.   Source Edit 
Red32f = distinct float32
32-bit float red color values.   Source Edit 
Rg8 = distinct Vec2[uint8]
8-bit red/green color values.   Source Edit 
Rg16 = distinct Vec2[uint16]
16-bit red/green color values.   Source Edit 
Rg32 = distinct Vec2[uint32]
32-bit red/green color values.   Source Edit 
Rg32f = distinct Vec2[float32]
32-bit float red/green color values.   Source Edit 
Rgb8 = distinct Vec3[uint8]
8-bit red/green/blue color values.   Source Edit 
Rgb16 = distinct Vec3[uint16]
16-bit red/green/blue color values.   Source Edit 
Rgb32 = distinct Vec3[uint32]
32-bit red/green/blue color values.   Source Edit 
Rgb32f = distinct Vec3[float32]
32-bit float red/green/blue color values.   Source Edit 
Rgba8 = distinct Vec4[uint8]
8-bit red/green/blue/alpha color values.   Source Edit 
Rgba16 = distinct Vec4[uint16]
16-bit red/green/blue/alpha color values.   Source Edit 
Rgba32 = distinct Vec4[uint32]
32-bit red/green/blue/alpha color values.   Source Edit 
Rgba32f = distinct Vec4[float32]
32-bit float red/green/blue/alpha color values.   Source Edit 
Depth16 = uint16
16-bit depth values.   Source Edit 
Depth24 = object
24-bit depth values.   Source Edit 
Depth32 = uint32
32-bit depth values.   Source Edit 
Depth32f = float32
32-bit float depth values.   Source Edit 
Stencil1 = object
1-bit stencil values.   Source Edit 
Stencil4 = object
4-bit stencil values.   Source Edit 
Stencil8 = uint8
8-bit stencil values.   Source Edit 
Stencil16 = uint16
16-bit stencil values.   Source Edit 
Depth24Stencil8 = object
Combined 24-bit depth value with 8-bit stencil value.   Source Edit 
Depth32fStencil8 = object
Combined 32-bit float depth value with 8-bit stencil value.   Source Edit 
ColorPixelType = Red8 | Rg8 | Rgb8 | Rgba8 | Red16 | Rg16 | Rgb16 | Rgba16 | Red32 |
    Rg32 |
    Rgb32 |
    Rgba32 |
    Red32f |
    Rg32f |
    Rgb32f |
    Rgba32f
Pixel formats for storing color values.   Source Edit 
DepthPixelType = Depth16 | Depth24 | Depth32 | Depth32f
Pixel formats for storing depth values.   Source Edit 
StencilPixelType = Stencil1 | Stencil4 | Stencil8 | Stencil16
Pixel formats for storing stencil values.   Source Edit 
DepthStencilPixelType = Depth24Stencil8 | Depth32fStencil8
Pixel formats for storing combined depth and stencil values.   Source Edit 
AnyPixelType = ColorPixelType | DepthPixelType | StencilPixelType |
    DepthStencilPixelType
Any valid pixel format.   Source Edit 
ClientPixelType = concept typeof(T)
    ## Concept that denotes any type that can be represented on the client side.
    T is AnyPixelType and
      not (T is object)
  Source Edit
